segments.text: Hello , this is Lucy from ABC Company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m calling to see if you have made your decision . You are the right person we are seeking for .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have decided to work with your company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good news for us . When can you start to work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s my honor to be one member of your company . I ’ d like to begin to work any time as you like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , please come to my office at 9 AM next Monday . I will introduce you to our boss .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Thank you for calling me .
segments.speaker: S2
